generated.css: @charset "UTF-8";*{margin:0;padding:0}.clearfix:after{content:"";display:block;clear:both}svg{width:1em;height:1em;vertical-align:-.15em;fill:currentColor}#player,svg{overflow:hidden}#player{width:100vw;height:100vh;background-color:#ebeae9;font-size:18px}#player .songTop{padding-top:20px;padding-bottom:3%}#player .songTop h2{font-weight:400;font-size:1.2em;color:#191918;text-align:center}#player .songTop p{font-size:14px;color:#888786;text-align:center;padding-top:10px}#player .songMain{overflow:hidden;width:200vw;height:calc(100vh - 250px);max-height:70vh;transition:transform .3s;display:flex;align-items:flex-start}#player .songMain .panel-effect{width:100vw;height:100%;display:flex;flex-direction:column;justify-content:center}#player .songMain .panel-effect .cover{width:100vw;height:76vw;display:flex;justify-content:center}#player .songMain .panel-effect .cover .square{width:76vw;height:76vw;border-radius:5px;overflow:hidden;box-shadow:0 20px 40px 0 hsla(0,0%,83.1%,.7)}#player .songMain .panel-effect .cover .square img{width:100%;height:100%}#player .songMain .panel-effect .mini-lyric{height:4em;padding-top:1.6em}#player .songMain .panel-effect .mini-lyric p{padding-left:2em;padding-right:2em;text-align:center;font-size:16px;color:#888786;margin:1em 0}#player .songMain .panel-effect .mini-lyric p.current{color:#000}#player .songMain .panel-lyrics{width:100vw;height:100%;box-shadow:inset 0 0 30px 20px #ebeae9;position:relative}#player .songMain .panel-lyrics .shadow{position:absolute;top:0;left:0;width:100vw;height:100%;box-shadow:0 0 30px 20px #ebeae9}#player .songMain .panel-lyrics .shadow:after{top:0}#player .songMain .panel-lyrics .shadow:after,#player .songMain .panel-lyrics .shadow:before{display:block;width:100%;content:"";position:absolute;left:0;box-shadow:0 0 30px 50px #ebeae9}#player .songMain .panel-lyrics .shadow:before{bottom:-1px}#player .songMain .panel-lyrics .container{transition:all 1s}#player .songMain .panel-lyrics .container p{padding-left:2em;padding-right:2em;text-align:center;font-size:16px;color:#888786;margin:1.4em 0}#player .songMain .panel-lyrics .container p.current{color:#000}#player .songMain.active{transform:translateX(-100vw)}#player .songBottom .option{display:flex;justify-content:center;align-items:center}#player .songBottom .option svg{width:24px;height:24px;margin-right:18%;fill:#636261}#player .songBottom .option svg:nth-child(4){margin-right:0}#player .songBottom .bar-area{padding:6% 0 4%;width:90vw;margin:0 auto}#player .songBottom .bar-area .bar{height:2px;background-color:#888786;margin:0 5px}#player .songBottom .bar-area .bar .progress{width:0;height:100%;position:relative;background-color:#191918}#player .songBottom .bar-area .bar .progress:after{content:"";display:block;position:absolute;top:-4px;right:-5px;width:10px;height:10px;border-radius:50%;background-color:#191918}#player .songBottom .bar-area .time{padding-top:16px;font-size:12px}#player .songBottom .bar-area .time .time-start{float:left}#player .songBottom .bar-area .time .time-end{float:right}#player .songBottom .actions{display:flex;justify-content:center;align-items:center}#player .songBottom .actions svg{width:24px;height:24px}#player .songBottom .actions svg:first-child{width:20px;height:20px;margin-right:10%}#player .songBottom .actions svg:last-child{margin-left:10%}#player .songBottom .actions svg:nth-child(2n){width:28px;height:28px}#player .songBottom .actions svg:nth-child(3){width:46px;height:46px;margin:0 12%}#player .playlist{width:100%;height:0;position:fixed;bottom:0;left:0;background-color:rgba(0,0,0,.3)}#player .playlist.active{width:100%;height:100%}#player .playlist ul{transition:all .4s;width:100%;overflow-y:auto;padding:.8em 0;position:absolute;bottom:0;left:0;transform:translateY(100%);border-top-right-radius:10px;border-top-left-radius:10px;background-color:#fff}#player .playlist ul.active{transform:translateY(0)}#player .playlist ul:before{content:"ùåÜ Êí≠ÊîæÂàóË°®";display:block;padding:.8em 1.2em;font-weight:700}#player .playlist ul li{display:flex;justify-content:space-between;align-items:center;padding:.8em 1.2em}#player .playlist ul li .playli-name{font-size:16px;font-weight:400}#player .playlist ul li .playli-name .playli-author{font-size:14px;color:#888786}#player .playlist ul li.active{color:#e97291}@media (max-width:320px){.mini-lyric p:last-child{display:none}}.QRcode{display:none}
